page.content: {Growth } houses { Property values In 1800 - 80 1930's - Â£100-Â£200 By 1900 - 110 1980's - Â£60,000 By 1945 - 114 -Â£80,000 In 1985 - 186 {1985 {No. dwellings Construction Roofs Houses 101 Stone 86 Tile 119 Cottages 50 Brick 100 Slate 62 Bungalows 35 Thatch 5 { {20 Council Houses}were built in 1955 to designs which were already out of date. The lack of garages or space now creates problems as more & more cars are parked on the grass verges. { {7}stone-built{bungalows}for{elderly people were built in the mid-70s. { {Planning permission}exists for further new homes and conversions.
